lead_paragraph: An official tally, with 97 percent of the ballots counted, showed that voters had rejected a bid by President Evo Morales to seek a fourth term.

headline.main: Bolivia’s President, Evo Morales, Faces Setback in Bid for Fourth Term

snippet: An official tally, with 97 percent of the ballots counted, showed that voters had rejected a bid by President Evo Morales to seek a fourth term.
abstract: Polls show Bolivian Pres Evo Morales is losing by 52 to 48 percent in referendum on term limits.
